title: PBM, TIKA host Iftar dinner for orphans
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 26 (APP): Pakistan Baitul Mal, (PBM) in collaboration with the Turkish Cooperation and Coordination Agency (TIKA), organised an Iftar dinner on Tuesday for 100 orphans from PBM Sweet Home to mark World Orphans Day.
Speaking on the occasion, Muhsin BALCI, TiKa’s Country Head, praised PBM’s dedication to caring for impoverished and orphaned children, and reiterated his commitment to collaborating with PBM to safeguard the rights of orphaned children.
On the occasion, Country Head TiKa and other team members also presented gifts to the orphan children.
He also utilised the opportunity to raise awareness among people about their important role in improving the lives of poor and orphaned children.
The event was also attended by Country Head TiKA, Muhsin BALCI, Directors of PBM and other officials.
